snippet.title: Amber Heard Accuses Johnny Depp for Using Divorce Settlement as Tax Deduction | People NOW | People
snippet.description:
Amber Heard calls out Johnny Depp for using the charity donation of their divorce settlement as a tax deduction, in an attempt to change the terms of the settlement itself.
